_symbol_format: .TICKER YYMMDD P/C STRIKE  (positive qty = buy, negative = sell)
notes: SPY 1x2 put ratio: long 1x 600P, short 2x 590P, Apr expiry
rationale: Free or credit spread, profits from moderate decline

entry_conditions.notes: Put ratio spread (1x2): buy 1 ATM put, sell 2 OTM puts. Can enter for credit or small debit. Risk: if stock drops below lower strike, exposed to naked put risk on extra short. Best in moderate IV with mild bearish view.

pnl_drivers.max_profit: At short strike at expiry: (long strike - short strike) + net credit (or - net debit)
pnl_drivers.max_loss: Downside: UNDEFINED below short strike minus max profit (extra naked short put). Upside: net debit (if debit entry) or zero/small (if credit entry)
pnl_drivers.primary_driver: Stock moves to short put strike and stays there
pnl_drivers.secondary_driver: Theta â€” net positive from extra short option, IV crush helps

greeks_profile.theta: positive â€” 2 short options decay faster than 1 long
greeks_profile.vega: mixed â€” net short vega from extra short option
greeks_profile.delta: slightly negative (bearish bias, but less than naked long put)
greeks_profile.gamma: negative below short strike â€” UNDEFINED RISK if stock tanks

pnl_drivers.ideal_scenario: Stock drops to short put strike (590) by expiry. Long put is ITM, both short puts are ATM. Maximum profit point.
